1: Celebrate greatness greatly in sacred places.
2: A beautiful city brings joy to the whole world.
3: Trusted refuge stands within community strongholds.
4: Leaders unite and move forward together
5: Observe wonders, embrace awe and choose timely, wise action.
6: Protection prevails; the people stand secure.
7: The east wind humbles mighty ships, securing peace.
8: A strong foundation keeps the community secure forever.
9: We center on steadfast love where we gather.
10: Righteous power earns praise across the whole world.
11: Righteous justice fills communities with joy and celebration.
12: I survey our community and note its enduring strengths.
13: Study enduring strengths and teach them to future generations.
14: Divine guidance endures for all time.
